alert.note: Alert for Jackson; Madison; Marshall (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 01 at 9:00PM CST by NWS Huntsville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Jackson, northern Marshall and southeastern Madison Counties through 945 PM CST... At 859 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Scottsboro, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Scottsboro, Guntersville, Hollywood, Grant, Skyline, Section, Woodville, Pisgah, Pleasant Groves and Dutton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 200 AM CST for north central and northeastern Alabama.
